Lyric:
[00:18.340]The other night dear, as I lay sleeping
[00:25.630]I dreamed I held you in my arms
[00:33.370] when I awoke, dear, I was mistaken
[00:41.660]and I hung my head and I cried.
[00:48.740]You are my sunshine, my only sunshine
[00:55.940]You make me happy when skies are gray
[01:03.450]You'll never know dear, how much I love you
[01:10.880]Please don't take my sunshine away
[02:05.570]You told me once, dear, you really loved me
[02:12.540]And no one else could come between.
[02:20.070]But not you've left me and love another;
[02:27.920]You have shattered all of my dreams:
[02:34.900]You are my sunshine, my only sunshine
[02:42.420]You make me happy when skies are gray
[02:50.500]You'll never know dear, how much I love you
[02:58.490]Please don't take my sunshine away
[03:05.770]You'll never know dear, how much I love you
[03:14.110]Please don't take my sunshine away
